info.name: SCR-LLM-Calls
info.description:
This collection is an add on to jump start your call introduction into the SAS LLM Prompt Builder Framework.  
  
You will find one example request per model currently available as part of the default framework.

Note that for proprietary models (like GPT and Claude) you need to specify an API Key - for this take a look at the collection variables where these have been pre configured and you just need to put in your key.

request.description: Call the Phi 3 mini model by Microsoft with a 4.000 token context length.
Call the Claude 2.0 proprietary model by Anthropic - Requires an Anthropic API key.
Call the Claude 2.1 proprietary model by Anthropic - Requires an Anthropic API key.
Call the Claude 3 Haiku proprietary model by Anthropic - Requires an Anthropic API key.
Call the Claude 3 Sonnet proprietary model by Anthropic - Requires an Anthropic API key.
Call the Claude 3.5 Sonnet proprietary model by Anthropic - Requires an Anthropic API key.
Call the Claude 3 Opus proprietary model by Anthropic - Requires an Anthropic API key.
Call the OpenAI GPT 4o proprietary model by OpenAI - Requires an OpenAI API key.
Call the OpenAI GPT 4o mini proprietary model by OpenAI - Requires an OpenAI API key.
Call the Mistral0 Nemo mini model by Mistral.
